participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, but often struggles with anger management.
participant_1.background: I like to dye my hair auburn because it is a natural-looking color that is easy to maintain. My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music. I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams. I love Katy Perry.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Artistic and whimsical, enjoys expressing himself through cooking and painting.
participant_2.background: I lie to my parents about my kids' behavior. Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs. I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum. I am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines and my immediate family is not in the culinary arts.

content.text: I have been playing the piano for a few years now and I am really getting the hang of it!  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to paint, and I also have two small dogs that I love to take care of.  What do you like to do on rainy days?
Rainy days are the perfect time for me to practice my music since my kids are usually playing video games.  What do you do for work?
I am an amateur chef who cooks five different cuisines.  I also work at a museum.  What are your favorite music genres?
I love pop music, and I am really excited to see Katy Perry in concert next month!  What are your plans for Halloween?
I love Halloween because I can wear my favorite comfortable clothes and collect as many toys as I want.  Do you have any pets?
I have two cats, and they are my best friends!  What is your favorite thing to do with your dogs?
I love to take them for walks in the park, and we go hiking together sometimes
